name: Standard Studio Apartment in Back Bay
neighborhood_overview: Back Bay is one of Boston's finest neighborhoods. It is close to tourist attractions, shopping and dining. It offers easy access to most other parts of the city either by subway or on foot.
description:
Copley House is comprised of apartments spread across multiple townhouses in Boston's Back Bay neighborhood. The Standard Studio can sleep up to 2 guests. Sleeping accommodations include 1 queen bed.

The space
Our Standard Studio has everything you need for a relaxing stay in Boston. Rest easy on a plush queen-sized mattress, take in the view from the room’s large window, or cook yourself a tasty meal using the room’s full kitchen.

Guest access
There are no parts of the apartment that are shared with other guests.

Other things to note
ID and credit card for incidentals are required for check in.

License number
Exempt: This listing is a hotel or motel
